CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( UPPER(SegmentDescription__c), "GLOBAL BROKERS","/resource/GB_logo", "TOP","/resource/TOP_logo", "TOP BROKERS", "/resource/TB_logo", "ORO", "/resource/Oro_logo", "PLATA", "/resource/Plata_logo", "RESTO", "/resource/RESTO_logo", "NEXT", "/resource/NEXT_logo", "START", "/resource/START_logo", "EXPATS", "/resource/EXPATS_logo", "ELITE", "/resource/ELITE_logo", "/resource/RESTO_logo" ), "Sin descripci√≥n" )
CustomField.label: Segmento
